timeline.bodyText: According to the codestyle for dubbo, using the '.*' form of import should be avoided
timeline.author: AlbumenJ

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your reviewd.I had fix it.
replies.author: tangcent

timeline.message:
polish DubboBootstrap

- use Collections.singletonList instead of Arrays.asList
- replace some lambda expressions to method reference
